item.title: High school football player suffers brain bleed during game, rushed to hospital, officials say
item.description: A West Morgan High School football player fell to the ground during Friday’s game and was rushed to the hospital.

item.title: ‘Really scary’: Teen nearly dies after ‘Benadryl’ social media challenge
item.description: A teenager nearly died after doing a TikTok trend involving Benadryl, according to her mother.

item.title: Hit-and-run driver kills pedestrian, crashes a second time, FHP says
item.description: A crash just after 8 p.m. Friday killed a 46-year-old Bradenton man, and Florida Highway Patrol says an illegal alien is to blame.

item.title: Cortez public boat ramp stirs up community concerns
item.description: The community is concerned with increased traffic, limited space, and losing their restaurants.

item.title: The Tervis Store is NOT Closing in Osprey
item.description: Hosana Fieber and Rogan Donelly, Co-Owners of The Tervis Store in Osprey, joined us to talk about the make your own cup experience.

item.title: ‘We have to be louder, now more than ever’: Sarasota residents rally in remembrance of Charlie Kirk
item.description: Kirk was the subject of a political assassination on Wednesday September 10th while speaking at Utah Valley University.

item.title: Dry to start the week on the Suncoast.
item.description: Dry air to start the week

item.title: Booker High School mourns loss of iconic coach
item.description: Gilmore graduated from BHS in 1984 and later returned to his alma mater where he was coach in football, baseball and weightlifting for 32 years.

item.title: 14-year-old Braden River High School student charged after Snapchat school shooting threat
item.description: The teen is being held at the Juvenile Detention Center.

item.title: Punta Gorda business cited in crackdown on sales of alcohol, tobacco to minors
item.description: Six businesses complied with the law.

item.title: Couple arrested after 5-year-old found in squalid conditions, Sarasota police say
item.description: The investigator noted the child’s hair was matted with food, and was wearing a heavily soiled diaper.
